 Home

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.22.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Poppins|||on|||||” header_font_size=”24px” header_letter_spacing=”0.5px” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” header_text_align_tablet=”” header_text_align_phone=”left” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Client Bill of Rights

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”gcid-388bea5e-1853-420f-bb0c-1bf7cb437466″ custom_padding=”||100px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||40px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”||15px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-388bea5e-1853-420f-bb0c-1bf7cb437466%22:%91%22background_color%22,%22background_color%22%93}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.22.2″ _module_preset=”default” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”88%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||40px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”||40px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.22.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|||on|||||” text_letter_spacing=”6px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Affordable Tax Relief ’s

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.22.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”40px” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||14px|||” custom_padding=”30px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”30px||30px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”18px||30px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_text_align_tablet=”center” header_2_text_align_phone=”center” header_2_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_2_font_size_phone=”26px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”center” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Commitment to Our Clients

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.22.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Client Bill of Rights enshrines our Company’s commitment to providing award-winning client care and industry-leading results to every client.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”||0px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”50px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb image=”https://optimataxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/ICO-cbor-service-g.svg” alt=”Client Bill of Rights – Service Icon” image_icon_width=”75px” content_max_width=”385px” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” hover_enabled=”0″ border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”ICO-cbor-service-g” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Affordable Tax Relief clients have the right to services of the highest industry standard.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb image=”https://optimataxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/ICO-cbor-expectations-g.svg” alt=”Client Bill of Rights – Service Icon” image_icon_width=”100px” content_max_width=”385px” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” hover_enabled=”0″ border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”ICO-cbor-expectations-g” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Affordable Tax Relief clients have the right to clear expectations on our two-phase process.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb image=”https://optimataxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/ICO-cbor-honesty-g.svg” alt=”Client Bill of Rights – Service Icon” image_icon_width=”100px” content_max_width=”385px” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”ICO-cbor-honesty-g”]

Affordable Tax Relief clients have the right to honesty in all communication with clear and easy to understand language.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb image=”https://optimataxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/ICO-cbor-investigation-g.svg” alt=”Client Bill of Rights – Service Icon” image_icon_width=”100px” content_max_width=”385px” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”ICO-cbor-investigation-g”]

Affordable Tax Relief clients have the right to receive a full and thorough investigation of their past, current, and potential tax issues.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb image=”https://optimataxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/ICO-cbor-timely-g.svg” alt=”Client Bill of Rights – Service Icon” image_icon_width=”100px” content_max_width=”385px” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”ICO-cbor-timely-g”]

Affordable Tax Relief clients have the right to have their concerns heard and addressed promptly on any issue they have.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb image=”https://optimataxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/ICO-cbor-informed-g.svg” alt=”Client Bill of Rights – Service Icon” image_icon_width=”75px” content_max_width=”385px” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”40px||29px||false|false” border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”ICO-cbor-informed-g”]

Affordable Tax Relief clients have the right to clear, logical communication that empowers them to make informed decisions.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb image=”https://optimataxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/ICO-cbor-confidentiality-g.svg” alt=”Client Bill of Rights – Service Icon” image_icon_width=”100px” content_max_width=”385px” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”ICO-cbor-confidentiality-g”]

Affordable Tax Relief clients have the right to expect confidentiality in all matters pertaining to their case.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb image=”https://optimataxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/ICO-cbor-experience-g.svg” alt=”Client Bill of Rights – Service Icon” image_icon_width=”100px” content_max_width=”385px” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”ICO-cbor-experience-g”]

Affordable Tax Relief clients have the right to the smoothest and most innovative client experience available in the industry.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb image=”https://optimataxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/ICO-cbor-response-g.svg” alt=”Client Bill of Rights – Service Icon” image_icon_width=”100px” content_max_width=”385px” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”ICO-cbor-response-g”]

Affordable Tax Relief clients have the right to speak to the person assigned to their case or receive a response within 24 hours.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb image=”https://optimataxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/ICO-cbor-individual-g.svg” alt=”Client Bill of Rights – Service Icon” image_icon_width=”100px” content_max_width=”385px” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” hover_enabled=”0″ border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”ICO-cbor-individual-g” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Affordable Tax Relief clients have the right to be treated like an individual, not a number.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ global_module=”12172″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”TrustPilot Carousel” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”50px||50px||true|false” custom_padding=”10px||10px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Trustpilot

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”rgba(234,234,234,0.5)” custom_margin=”70px|auto|60px|auto|false|false” custom_padding=”20px||20px|30px|true|false” border_color_all=”#1C50A4″ border_width_left=”6px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#1C50A4″ header_2_font_size=”22px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let Affordable Tax Relief Help

Call 1-800-536-0734 for a free consultation.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_text=”GET TAX RELIEF” button_alignment=”right” button_alignment_tablet=”center” button_alignment_phone=”center” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_class=”lightbox-trigger-help” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”6ead079b-43da-4313-8700-0192b4421332″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#040011″ button_bg_color=”#7CDA24″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#0C71C3″ button_border_radius=”60px” button_letter_spacing=”0.1px” button_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” button_icon=”E||divi||400″ custom_margin=”5px|30px|5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”10px|35px|10px|35px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”15px|45px|15px|45px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”15px|45px|15px|45px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”fade” button_text_size_tablet=”16px” button_text_size_phone=”14px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0.3px” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” module_alignment_tablet=”” module_alignment_phone=”center” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#1C50A4″ header_2_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let Affordable Tax Relief Help

Call 1-800-536-0734 for a free consultation.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”GET TAX RELIEF” button_alignment=”center” button_alignment_tablet=”center” button_alignment_phone=”center” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone” disabled_on=”off|off|off” module_class=”lightbox-trigger-help” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”6ead079b-43da-4313-8700-0192b4421332″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”15px” button_text_color=”#040011″ button_bg_color=”#7CDA24″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#0C71C3″ button_border_radius=”60px” button_letter_spacing=”0.1px” button_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” button_icon=”E||divi||400″ custom_margin=”5px|30px|5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”20px|20px||20px|false|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”10px|40px|10px|40px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”15px|45px|15px|45px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”15px|45px|15px|45px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”fade” button_text_size_tablet=”16px” button_text_size_phone=”14px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0.3px” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
